title: Glued to the telly
creator_credit: Vixen Films, Stuart Menzies and Jo Lane
brief_description: Looks at the history of Australian television and how it has impacted on the lives and culture of Australians. The program provides statistics on television viewing and uses archival footage, interviews and drama segments to evaluate the impact of “telly”.
creator_credit_for_label: Vixen Films, Stuart Menzies and Jo Lane
